feeds.title: Warm Thanks from Famcy!!!!!
feeds.desc:
As winter settles in, Famcy takes a moment to reflect on the immense gratitude we feel toward our incredible community.

When my wife and I decided to open our ice cream parlor in Pangyo last September, we dreamed of creating a space where people could come together to share the joy of desserts weâ€™ve cherished from around the world over the years.

â€œDelivering happiness, one cone or cup at a time!â€
â€‹
We know ice cream isnâ€™t the first thing that comes to mind when the weather turns chilly, but we believe it can still be a source of comfort and joy.

Our shop remains a cozy, welcoming spot to take a break from the cold with a warm drink or a bite of something sweet. Whether youâ€™re stopping by for a fresh real fruit icecream, a warm espresso drink, or an affogato, weâ€™d love to see you this season.

From the bottom of our hearts, thank you for making our dream a reality. Your love for what we do fuels our passion, and we look forward to serving you throughout this winter and beyond.

Famcy
